overview: A beggar called Lyangra (the cripple guy), who lives at the railway station, regularly goes to the house of Kaala, a drug dealer, to buy his weed from him. When kaala's wife sohagi catches his eye, lyangra starts trying to get closer to kaala and eventually has an affair with sohagi. when kaala finds out he beats sohagi and she runs away with lyangra to his hometown. when she hears there that lyangra is a convicted murderer, who runs away from place to place just to avoid his sentence, sohagi gets scared and she wants to return to kaala.
title: The Instinct
